flawed_nl_solution:
After the birds ate 19 of the tomatoes Haruto has 127 - 19 = <<127-19=112>>112 tomatoes left.
After giving half of his tomatoes to his friend, Haruto had 112 / 2 = <<112/2=56>>56 tomatoes.
#### 56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 108, not 112. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
